p: Fixed gastric tissues were embedded in paraffin blocks and sectioned to a thickness of 4 µm. Tissue sections were stained with H&E, using a staining kit from ScyTek Laboratories Inc. (cat. no. HAE-1; West Logan, UT, USA) according to the manufacturer’s instructions, and observed by using a light microscope (Nikon Eclipse Ci-L; Nikon Corp., Tokyo, Japan).
